fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Light Punch: Visit a player. Gain 1 Combo if you're the only visitor. Attack them if you have 3+ Combo.
- [__DANDY STEP__]: Requires 1 combo. Gain a combo if you are visited tonight. Any attackers will be roleblocked and you will attack them. Gain an additional combo if you kill someone.
- [__MAPPA HUNCH__]: Requires 3 combo. Choose up to two players. If you chose the other fighter, they learn a number of players equal to 3/5 or 2/5 of the alive players, rounded up,  depending on if you chose one or two players respectively, one of which being you. If no chosen player is the other fighter, attack the chosen players. If you only attack one player this way, your attack level is treated as one higher. Gain 1 combo for each one killed.

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- __[BLOODSUCKING UNIVERSE]__: Spend [1] Combo. Attack a player with a powerful attack. If they die, gain 1 combo and Enter Universe state. While in Universe state your attack and defense are naturally powerful. Exit universe state at the end of the night if: you kill someone, are attacked, or 2 nights pass. If you leave this state by killing someone, gain another combo.
- Overdrive (__LAST HORIZON__): Requires 5 Combo. Deal an Overkill attack to anyone. Also, all players see this video in daychat, and the victim is pinged.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the other Fighter, then be the last one standing
